message:
Bread Crumbs Studio  –Web and Mobile apps studio located at Zamalek - is looking for functional/automation software testing engineer with minimum one year experience in testing mobile apps and mobile apps based systems.
Please send your resume with email subject ‘Software Testing Engineer’ to ismail@b-c-studio.com

data.message:
Have you checked the pinned post in this group, Ismail?
This is a serious question. Did you come from mobile and you had to expand pinned posts to see it? Is there another reason you didn't see it? A curiious admin.
No i didnt see it, why?
Just saw it now, didnt know that facebook group pinned posts separately.. Feel free to remove this post when you read this and sorry for the inconvenience

No problem. You have been randomly selected as a subject to help understand why some people tend to not see the pinned post. Were you on mobile? Is there another reason? Did you see the group description when you joined it?
* I'm trying to figure out what the blockers from seeing the message are and finding solutions to them. Thanks in advance for your help.
اه لاحظت ان فيه ناس كتير مابياخدوش بالهم لما بشيل البوست و ابعتلهم رسالة انهم violated the group roles اعتقد المشكل ىالأساسية انهم موبايل و مش بيشوفوها لأنها بتبقى فى بيدج منفصلة

Yeah i am from an iPhone 5 and i saw the description when i joined.. Its nice to have a group for geeks.
Unfortiently i dont use the group much or answer questions as most of the questions are not related to my field of expertise..
I was looking for a software tester to join my team and i thought i might good candidates here
OK. Very good outcome. We probably need to ensure the group description echos the pinned post, Mohamed Alaa El Din?

Ismail Zohdy sure, repost it in here it'll be great, i hope you find good tester 
https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=673428112750757
